spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout is recognizable (left twin-bedroom, central bath cluster, right master, open living/dining/kitchen), but several plan-to-render mismatches exist: the small study/office zone between bathroom and master is not clearly preserved as a distinct functional room; central circulation and the living-room enclosure/partition dimensions differ from the 2D plan; multiple door positions/swing orientations do not match the plan; window placement does not follow the 2D locations (notably kitchen window/wall and top-wall windows).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is mostly consistent (bedroom-bath/study-master chain; living adjacent to dining/kitchen), but fidelity breaks due to the study/office not being faithfully represented, inconsistent wall thickness/offsets vs the plan, and at least one apparent added exterior opening not shown in the 2D drawing. Door integration is inconsistent (some doors appear shifted relative to wall corners/segments).

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are present (beds, dining set, sofa/TV wall, kitchen run), but the study/office furniture mapping is incorrect/unclear (desk placement not matching the plan). Some items are repositioned (master bed/desk and living set) in ways that do not match the 2D arrangement, and some scales feel inconsistent (oversized circulation relative to room furnishing).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style render with decent lighting and materials. However, it is not a true orthographic/isometric match to the 2D (perspective depth is present), and some geometry reads simplified (partition lengths and openings not crisply aligned to the plan). Overall composition is clear.

detected_errors.description: Study/office function from the 2D plan (room with desk at top-middle/right) is not faithfully represented; desk/office layout appears missing or converted into a different use.
Window placement mismatch: kitchen window appears on a different exterior wall/position than the 2D plan’s bottom-wall window at the sink zone.
Top-wall window placements (bathroom/study/master zone) do not clearly align with the 2D plan’s indicated openings.
Multiple door swing/orientation inconsistencies versus the 2D arcs (several doors appear to swing differently or are hinged on the opposite side).
At least one interior door appears shifted relative to the 2D plan (door leaf not centered/located on the same wall segment as in the drawing).
Proportion distortion: central hall/open area and living-room partition lengths differ from the 2D plan, changing relative room sizes and enclosure depth.
Possible hallucinated exterior opening/door (large opening on the right-side exterior wall) not clearly indicated in the 2D plan.
